histore.archive.reader module¶

class histore.archive.reader.ArchiveReader¶

Bases: object

Reader for rows in a dataset archive. Reads rows in ascending order of their identifier.

abstract close()¶

Release all reseources that are associated with the reader.

abstract next()¶

Read the next row in the dataset archive.

Returns None if the end of the archive rows has been reached.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow

class histore.archive.reader.SnapshotIterator(reader: histore.archive.reader.ArchiveReader, version: int, schema: List[histore.document.schema.Column], is_keyed: bool)¶

Bases: histore.document.base.DocumentIterator

Reader for data streams. Provides the functionality to open the stream for reading. Dataset reader should be able to read the same dataset multiple times.

close()¶

Close the associated archive reader and set it to None (to avoid repeated attempts to close it multiple times).

next() → Tuple[int, Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime, Tuple[Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime], …]], List[Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime]]]¶

Read the next row in the document.

Returns the row position, row index and the list of cell values for each of the document columns. Raises a StopIteration error if an attempt is made to read past the end of the document.

Returns

Return type

tuple of int, histore.document.base.RowIndex, histore.document.base.DataRow

class histore.archive.reader.SnapshotReader(reader: Callable, version: int, schema: List[histore.document.schema.Column], is_keyed: bool)¶

Bases: histore.document.base.DefaultDocument

Stream reader for rows in a dataset archive snapshot.

close()¶

There are no resources that need to be released.

open() → histore.archive.reader.SnapshotIterator¶

Open the data stream to get a iterator for the rows in the dataset snapshot.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.reader.SnapshotIterator

histore.archive.reader.row_stream(reader)¶

Geterator that yields all rows in an archive.

Parameters

reader (histore.arcive.reader.ArchiveReader) – Archive reader over which we are iterating.

Returns

Return type

histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow
